PIN.values: |make a rollover + a color for selected points|

|Very basic patch at the moment (more modules to come).&cr;&lf;- modes: lock / add / edit&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;ADD:&cr;&lf;- left click in the output render creates quads / add rectangle. &cr;&lf;right click turn it to a layer.&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;EDIT:&cr;&lf;- 4 corners distortion for medias:&cr;&lf; - MOUSE: drag points with the mouse on the output&cr;&lf; - KEYBOARD: select layer + hold 1, 2, 3 and 4 keys, and move point with arrows. &cr;&lf; +SHIFT to move faster&cr;&lf; - Select a layer and hit "CTRL + DELETE" to delete the shape/layer.&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;- pixel oriented preview &cr;&lf; - (zoom on projector output)&cr;&lf; - zoom in/out slider + drag red area&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;- LAYERS: rollover, select|
|background: photo or image reference&cr;&lf;TODO: structured light|

|TODO&cr;&lf;- add polygons with different bin sizes&cr;&lf;- load jpg / videos&cr;&lf;- load SVG&cr;&lf;- save SVG&cr;&lf;- texture sampling&cr;&lf;- select object + move point&cr;&lf;- grid distort, and export edited model&cr;&lf;- view medias / textsample&cr;&lf;- drag and drop media&cr;&lf;- texsample: random sampling + slow movement&cr;&lf;- view: point coordinates and edit manually&cr;&lf;- transform homography en mesh&cr;&lf;- select layer in preview&cr;&lf;- select points in preview&cr;&lf;- constraint xy coordinates while dragging (red preview rect)&cr;&lf;- MEDIAS MANAGER&cr;&lf;- ASSIGN MEDIAS TO SHAPES|
|BUGS:&cr;&lf;FIRST POLYGON = BUG&cr;&lf;SOMETIMES BUG WHEN SAVING / LOADING SVG|
